DOC.brief_title: The Effect Time Restricted Feeding Fat Mass Overweight Women
DOC.detailed_description: Participants ( 16 overweight woman , BMI ( Body mass index ) ˃25 , age 18- 30 ) complete one-month intervention restrict daily food intake 8-hour time period , i.e. , 1200 2000 hour . During remain 16-hour intermittent fasting period ( 2000 1200 hour ) participant allow drink zero calorie beverage ( diet soda pop , black coffee , tea , water , etc ) order maintain normal hydration . There attempt restrict food intake . Rather simply restrict time period day food consume . Participants ' fat mass monitor non-invasively use densitometry ( Bod Pod ) prior follow 4 week intervention participant eat normal daily intake 8-hour period day ( 1200 2000 hour ) . The Bod Pod measure body volume via air displacement together accurate measure body mass enable body density calculate ( Density = mass/volume ) . Satisfaction , hunger , fullness diet monitor weekly basis use validate visual analog scale ( Flit et al , 2000 ) . Adherence diet also assess weekly basis number day diet followed . During 16-hour fasting period participant able drink much zero calorie beverage desire . On day 2 , 7 , 14 , 21 , & 28 participant return lab 8am ( follow 12 hour fast period ) acidity urine ( use urine dip stick ) blood sugar ( use glucometer ) test . Following one month participant allow either continue eat pattern revert prior 3 meal intake . After month self-regulation , participant ' fat mass measure use Bod Pod .
